attributes.action: Make a sugary drinks tax in Horsham west sussex
attributes.additional_details: The saved money would go partly to the Children's health fund and it could also go to the NHS to spend on more important heath issues such as cancers
attributes.background: Hello we are three year 10 students taking GCSE citizenship that are aiming to put a tax on sugary drinks in Horsham.Taking in too much sugar can have devastating impacts on your body such as diabetes, obesity and heart disease. We believe putting a tax on sugary drinking would reduce this.

rejection.details:
Taxes apply across the country, not just to specific towns like Horsham.

If you would like there to be a tax on sugary drinks across the country, you could sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106651
